title: Why didn't I get the Mastery Token.
body: I played Master Yi yesterday and got Level 5 Mastery with him. After that game i played again getting an S rank. However I didn't get the Mastery Token. Could you help me with this?

replies.body: You can't get Champion Mastery tokens in any map except for Summoner's Rift. Do you think this could be the problem?
It was on One for All, my bad

> [{quoted}](name=TheUltimiteNoob,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=4URtdNgr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-18T10:18:37.566+0000)
>
> It was on One for All, my bad

Ah, yup!

> NO 6 GODS Matchmade games on Howling Abyss, Twisted Treeline or any rotating game mode will not award Champ Mastery level 6 or 7 tokens

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-612-notes#patch-champion-mastery

No worries, mate. This is a REALLY new change, and I had to look it up myself. G'luck on the Mastery Token grind though!
